summary: The flag of the United States of America is a national flag.
full_text: The flag of the United States of America, often referred to as the American flag, is the national flag of the United States. It consists of thirteen equal horizontal stripes of red  alternating with white, with a blue rectangle in the canton  bearing fifty small, white, five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars  alternating with rows of five stars. The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America, and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen British colonies that declared independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain, and became the first states in the Union. Nicknames for the flag include the Stars and Stripes, Old Glory, and the Star-Spangled Banner.
title: Flag of the United States
